Shoots dark ice crystals
The blade creates frost explosions on direct hits

debuffs.tooltip: Cannot move and defense is shattered

name: Abyss Blade
tooltip: Fires short-range tridents
Hitting enemies will inflict the crush depth debuff
The lower the enemies' defense, the more damage they take from this debuff

name: Aegis Blade
tooltip: Striking an enemy with the blade causes an earthen eruption
Right click to fire an aegis bolt

name: Aftershock
tooltip: Summons boulders from the sky on enemy hits

name: Air Spinner
tooltip: Fires feathers when enemies are near
A very agile yoyo

name: Amidias' Trident
tooltip: Shoots homing whirlpools

name: Anarchy Blade
tooltip: The lower your life the more damage this blade does
Your hits will generate a large explosion
If you're below 50% life your hits have a chance to instantly kill regular enemies

name: Ancient Shiv
tooltip: Enemies release a blue aura cloud on death
Shortflurry attacks increase melee speed by 5%

name: Animus
tooltip: Randomizes its damage on enemy hits

name: Aorta
tooltip: Fires homing blood when enemies are near
An exceptionally agile yoyo

name: Aquatic Discharge
tooltip: Enemies release electric sparks on death
Shortflurry attacks paralyze enemies

name: Aquatic Dissolution
tooltip: Fires whaling spears from the sky that bounce off tiles

name: Ark of the Ancients
tooltip: Using RMB will extend the Ark out in front of you. Hitting an enemy with it will parry them, granting you a small window of invulnerability
You can also parry projectiles and temporarily make them deal 160 less damage
Parrying will empower the next 10 swings of the sword, boosting their damage and letting them throw stronger projectiles
Using RMB and pressing up while the Ark is empowered will release all the charges in a powerful burst of energy

name: Ark of the Cosmos
tooltip: Performs a combo of swings, alternating between narrow and wide swings and throwing the blade out every 5 swings
The thrown blade is held in place by constellations and will follow your cursor
Releasing the mouse while the blade is out will throw the second half towards it, making the scissors snap and explode into stars
Using RMB will snip out the scissor blades in front of you.
Hitting an enemy with it will parry them, granting you a small window of invulnerability
You can also parry projectiles and temporarily make them deal 200 less damage
Parrying will empower the next 10 swings of the sword, letting you use both blades at once
Using RMB and pressing up while the Ark is empowered will throw the blades in front of you to provoke a Big Rip in spacetime, using up all your charges in the process
If more than half the charges were used up, you can dash across the rip by keeping the up key pressed down

name: Ark of the Elements
tooltip: Performs a combo of swings, throwing the blade out every 5 swings
Releasing the mouse while the blade is out will throw the second half towards it, making the scissors snap
Snapping the scissors together increase their damage and empower your next two swings
Using RMB will snip out the scissor blades in front of you
Hitting an enemy with it will parry them, granting you a small window of invulnerability
You can also parry projectiles and temporarily make them deal 200 less damage
Parrying will empower the next 10 swings of the sword, letting you use both blades at once
Using RMB and pressing up while the Ark is empowered will throw the blades in front of you to provoke a Big Rip in spacetime, using up all your charges in the process

name: Astral Blade
tooltip: Deals more damage the more life an enemy has left

name: Astral Pike
tooltip: Summons astral star swarms on critical hits

name: Astral Scythe
tooltip: Shoots a scythe ring that accelerates over time

name: Ataraxia
tooltip: Equanimity

name: Avalanche
tooltip: Spawns ice bombs that explode after 3 seconds into ice shards on hit

name: Deicide
tooltip: In the end remained two numbers painted in the blood of the gods...
Slowly throws out punches that increase in speed over time
After 10 seconds, homing sacrilegious fists will be fired with each punch
After 30 seconds, a dark wreathe is formed around the player that increases their damage by 22%
Punching gradually causes the player to be fueled with malice, eventually causing an instant death

name: Phaseslayer
tooltip: A rough prototype of the Murasama blade, it is formed entirely from laser energy
Wield a colossal laser blade which is controlled by the cursor
Faster swings deal more damage and release sword beams
When at low charge, the blade is smaller and weaker
Current Charge: [CHARGE]

name: Phoenix Blade
tooltip: Enemies explode and emit healing flames on death

name: Phosphorescent Gauntlet
tooltip: Mythical tool of the forsaken fishron used to vaporize half of the universe's creators.
Releases rapid sulphurous punches
On use, you lunge in the direction of the mouse
On collision, you are knocked back

name: Photon Ripper
tooltip: Projects a directed stream of hardlight teeth at ultra high velocity
This weapon and its projectiles function as a chainsaw

name: Plague Keeper
tooltip: Fires a plague and bee cloud

name: Prismatic Breaker
tooltip: Seems to belong to a certain magical girl. Radiates with intense cosmic energy.
Fire to charge for a powerful rainbow laser
Right click to instead swing the sword and fire rainbow colored waves
The sword is boosted by both melee and ranged damage

name: Pulse Dragon
tooltip: Heavy duty flails, each containing a powerful generator which is activated upon launch
Throws two dragon heads that emit electrical fields
Current Charge: [CHARGE]

name: Pwnagehammer
tooltip: Throws a heavy, gravity-affected hammer that creates a loud blast of hallowed energy when it hits something
There is a 20 percent chance for the hammer to home in on a target
Homing hammers summon an additional spectral hammer on hit and are guaranteed to land a critical hit

name: Quagmire
tooltip: Fires spore clouds

name: Raito
tooltip: Legendary sword of the heavens

name: Red Sun
tooltip: Over paradise
Drops a barrage of solar flares from the sky

name: Redtide Spear
tooltip: The people of the sea were adept hunters, but they abhorred unnecessary violence.
Unfortunately, neighboring nations were brutish, so they fashioned their tools for war.

name: Redtide Sword
tooltip: Throws short-range whirlpools

name: Rem's Revenge
tooltip: Wielded by the most powerful fighter.
Summons blood explosions and lowers enemy defense on hit

name: Riptide
tooltip: Sprays a spiral of aqua streams in random directions
A very agile yoyo

name: Rox
tooltip: The sword was holding back its power...
Left click to unleash a storm of rock shards
Right click to perform a groundpound that unleashes a large explosion of rocks upon impact

name: Roxcalibur
tooltip: You couldn’t get it out of the rock, so you just brought the rock instead
A hellish entity of flesh holds the key to this weapon’s power
Left click to shoot several rock shards
Right click to dive downwards and bounce off enemies
Diving into blocks creates a shockwave

name: Sausage Maker
tooltip: Sprays homing blood on hit

name: Scourge of the Cosmos
tooltip: Throws a bouncing cosmic scourge that emits tiny homing cosmic scourges on death and tile hits

name: Seashine Sword
tooltip: Shoots an aqua sword beam

name: Seeking Scorcher
tooltip: May your enemies burn in hell for the sins they have committed
Throws a holy boomerang that seeks out up to three[sic] enemies before returning to the player

name: Shimmerspark
tooltip: Fires stars when enemies are near
A very agile yoyo

debuffs.name: Frostburn
debuffs.tooltip: It's either really hot or really cold. Either way it REALLY hurts

name: Solar Flare
tooltip: Emits large holy explosions on hit
A very agile yoyo

name: Solstice Claymore
tooltip: Changes projectile color based on the time of year
Inflicts daybroken during the day and nightwither during the night

name: Soul Edge
tooltip: Fires the ghastly souls of long-deceased abyss dwellers

debuffs.name: Crush Depth
debuffs.duration: 5 seconds (Contact)3 seconds (Large Soul)2 seconds (Medium Soul)1 second (Small Soul)

name: Soul Harvester
tooltip: Shoots a soul scythe
Enemies explode when on low health, spreading the plague [sic]

debuffs.name: Plague
debuffs.tooltip: You are rotting from the inside

debuffs.name: Cursed Inferno
debuffs.tooltip: Losing lifeAll damage taken increased by 20%

name: Spine of Thanatos
tooltip: Releases 3 fast metallic whips outward
Once all three collide, a prism of light is shot outward
If an enemy is within the line of sight of the whips on collision, the light will fire towards it

name: Spore Knife
tooltip: Enemies release spore clouds on hit
Shortflurry attacks inflict Poisoned and spawn vines

name: Starnight Lance
tooltip: Shoots a starnight beam

debuffs.name: Frostburn
debuffs.tooltip: It's either really hot or really cold. Either way it REALLY hurts

name: Stellar Contempt
tooltip: Lunar flares rain down on enemy hits

name: Stellar Striker
tooltip: Summons a swarm of lunar flares from the sky on enemy hits

name: Storm Ruler
tooltip: Only a storm can fell a greatwood
Fires beams that generate tornadoes on death
Tornadoes suck enemies in

name: Storm Saber
tooltip: Fires two homing storm beams
One from blade and one from the sky

name: Stream Gouge
tooltip: Fires an essence spear clone that turns into a portal to summon more clones
Ignores immunity frames

name: Submarine Shocker
tooltip: Enemies release electric sparks on hit
Shortflurry attacks spawn poisonous clouds

name: Sulphurous Grabber
tooltip: Occasionally releases a ring of colored bubbles
The yoyo powers up after touching a green bubble
A very agile yoyo

name: Swordsplosion
tooltip: Sword swarm

debuffs.name: Frostburn
debuffs.tooltip: It's either really hot or really cold. Either way it REALLY hurts

name: Teardrop Cleaver
tooltip: Makes your enemies cry

name: Temporal Floe Sword
tooltip: The iceman cometh...
Fires a frozen sword beam that splits into two more beams
The direction of the beams depends on in game time

debuffs.name: Glacial State
debuffs.tooltip: Cannot move and defense is shattered

debuffs.name: Frostburn
debuffs.tooltip: It's either really hot or really cold. Either way it REALLY hurts

name: Tendon Tides
tooltip: Inundatio ex Sanguis
Throws tendon slicing disks that shred hit enemies
If an enemy is critically hit, the shred effect stacks and deals more damage over time

name: Tenebreus Tides
tooltip: Inundatio ex Laminis
Shoots a water spear that pierces enemies and terrain
Striking enemies summon liquid blades and spears to assault the struck foe

debuffs.name: Crush Depth
debuffs.duration: 5 seconds (Main Spear)3 seconds (Water Spear)2 seconds (Additional Spear/Sword)

name: Tenebris Tides
tooltip: Inundatio ex Gladii
Spins a speared baton that summons spears from below the cursor
Enemies hit with the baton are barraged with moldy blades and spears to assault the struck foe

name: Terra-cotta
tooltip: Causes enemies to erupt into healing projectiles on death
Enemies explode on hit

name: Terra Edge
tooltip: Heals the player on enemy hits
Fires a beam that inflicts ichor for a short time

name: Terra Lance
tooltip: Fires a lance beam

name: Terra Shiv
tooltip: Don't underestimate the power of shivs
Shortflurry attacks shoot out splitting beams that heal and inflict ichor
Melee speed and DR are also boosted by 15%

name: Terratomere
tooltip: Linked to the essence of Terraria
Heals the player on true melee hits
Fires a barrage of 4 homing beams that freeze enemies

name: Terror Blade
tooltip: Fires a terror beam that bounces off tiles
On every bounce it emits an explosion

name: The Burning Sky
tooltip: Hold the blade to the sky, and witness Armageddon

name: The Enforcer
tooltip: Spawns essence flames on hit

name: The God's Gambit
tooltip: Fires a stream of slime when enemies are near
A very agile yoyo

name: The King's Gambit
tooltip: Fires a stream of slime when enemies are near
A somewhat agile yoyo

name: The Last Mourning
tooltip: Summons flaming pumpkins and mourning skulls that split into fire orbs on enemy hits

name: The Microwave
tooltip: Fries nearby enemies with radiation
A very agile yoyo
Cooking, Astral Infection style

name: The Mutilator
tooltip: Striking an enemy below 20% life will trigger a bloodsplosion
Bloodsplosions cause hearts to drop that can be picked up to heal you

name: The Obliterator
tooltip: Ruins nearby enemies with death lasers
An exceptionally agile yoyo

debuffs.name: Frostburn
debuffs.tooltip: It's either really hot or really cold. Either way it REALLY hurts

name: The Oracle
tooltip: Gaze into the past, the present, the future... and the circumstances of your inevitable demise
Emits an aura of red lightning which charges up when hitting enemies
Fires auric orbs when supercharged
An exceptionally agile yoyo

name: Titan Arm
tooltip: Slap Hand but better
Sends enemies straight to the stars at the speed of light

name: Titan Tides
tooltip: Inundatio ex Deos
Channels a spinning cosmic aura that grows in size and spin speed over time
Enemies hit by the aura are barraged with dozens of god slayer blades which shred enemies

name: Totality Tides
tooltip: Inundatio ex Terminus
Summons a ball of exo energy on your cursor that sprays out a large amount of projectiles relative to your position

name: Triactis' True Paladinian Mage-Hammer of Might
tooltip: Explodes on enemy hits

name: Trinity
tooltip: Fires a spread of energy bolts

name: True Biome BladeMercurial Tides
tooltip: Hold the attack button to charge a heaven-shattering lunge, release to unleash the devastating blow. Shock waves are emitted as the sword charges up
Striking the earth with the lunge will cause a massive shock wave on impact which raises a flood of monoliths
Your secondary attunement can now provide passive bonuses
Active Attumenent : [Mercurial Tides]
Passive Attumenent : [None]
Does nothing.. yet
It seems that upgrading the blade expanded the scope of the previous attunements
Periodically emit shock waves while attacking

name: True Bloody Edge
tooltip: Chance to heal the player on enemy hits
Inflicts Burning Blood
Fires a bloody blade

name: True Caustic Edge
tooltip: Fires a bouncing caustic beam
Inflicts poison and venom

name: True Excalibur Shortsword
tooltip: Don't underestimate the power of shortswords

name: True Forbidden Oathblade
tooltip: Fires a spread of demonic scythes and critical hits cause shadowflame explosions

name: True Night's Stabber
tooltip: Don't underestimate the power of stabby knives
Shortflurry attacks spawn healing beams that shoot cursed fireballs, and increases melee speed by 10%

name: True Tyrant's Ultisword
tooltip: Fires blazing, hyper, and sunlight blades
Gives the player the tyrant's fury buff on enemy hits
This buff increases melee damage by 30% and melee crit chance by 10%

buffs.name: Tyrant's Fury
buffs.tooltip: 30% increased melee damage and 10% increased melee crit chance

name: Tumbleweed
tooltip: Releases a rolling tumbleweed on hit

name: Typhon's Greed
tooltip: Summons water spirits while in use

name: Tyrant Yharim's Ultisword
tooltip: Fires homing blazing blades
Gives the player the tyrant's fury buff on enemy hits
This buff increases melee damage by 30% and melee crit chance by 10%

buffs.name: Tyrant's Fury
buffs.tooltip: 30% increased melee damage and 10% increased melee crit chance

name: Ultimus Cleaver
tooltip: Launches damaging homing sparks and explodes on enemy hits

name: Unloxcalibur
tooltip: An average broadsword

name: Urchin Flail
tooltip: Launch an urchin ball, which shoots a spike on contact with an enemy

name: Urchin Mace
tooltip: Throws out a whirlpool when released at full charge

name: Urchin Spear
tooltip: Poisons enemies and fires short-range stingers

name: Vein Burster
tooltip: Fires a blood ball that sticks to tiles and explodes

name: Verdant
tooltip: Fires crystal leaves when enemies are near
A very agile yoyo

name: Violence
tooltip: Releases a blazing fork which stays near the mouse and shreds enemies, racking up Violence Points that can be used for strong attacks

name: Virulence
tooltip: Fires a plague cloud

name: Vulcanite Lance
tooltip: Explodes on enemy hits and summons homing flares on critical hits

name: Waraxe
tooltip: Critical hits cleave enemy armor, reducing their defense by 15 and protection by 25%

name: Warblade
tooltip: Critical hits cleave enemy armor, reducing their defense by 15 and protection by 25%

name: Wind Blade
tooltip: Fires cyclones that suck enemies in

name: Wind Turbine Blade
tooltip: Thrusts towards the cursor when used
Right clicking after stabbing 3 times will result in a much larger swing, accompanied by a gust of wind

name: Wulfrum Leech Dagger
tooltip: Drains a percentage of enemy health on hit
Cannot inflict critical hits
Shortflurry attacks make the weapon unconsumable for 3 seconds

name: Wulfrum Screwdriver
tooltip: Can be used to rapidly and royally screw over any foe, provided they're weak enough
Striking an enemy has a chance to give you a wulfrum screw, that you can throw back at them by right clicking
Hitting a flung screw with the screwdriver will boost its damage and speed, sending it hurling forwards at high speeds

name: XB-∞ Hekate
tooltip: Witchcraft creeps upon thee
Summons exo flame geyser explosions on enemy hits

name: Yateveo Bloom
tooltip: A synthesis of jungle flora
Creates blooming roses with each swing
Right click to throw a powerful rose spear
Attacks explode with numerous petals

name: Yin-Yo
tooltip: Fires light or dark shards when enemies are near
Shards fly back and forth
A very agile yoyo
